plot: Bautista Amaya, a forensic anthropologist falls in love with Ana Monserrat. Soon, he discovers a network of human trafficking and he will try to stop them.
plot_en: Bautista Amaya, a forensic anthropologist falls in love with Ana Monserrat. Soon, he discovers a network of human trafficking and he will try to stop them.
plot_es: Bautista Amaya, a forensic anthropologist falls in love with Ana Monserrat. Soon, he discovers a network of human trafficking and he will try to stop them.
title: Vidas robadas
